descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Minnesota's Karl-Anthony Towns drives to the basket for the easy dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Karl-Anthony Towns elevates for jam vs. Detroit Pistons) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Karl-Anthony Towns slams it down for a dunk

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns gets the bounce pass assist to Patrick Beverley, who gets the ball off before the shot clock expires.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Karl-Anthony Towns makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Karl-Anthony Towns with a beautiful bounce pass assist to Patrick Beverley

videos.description: Minnesota's Karl-Anthony Towns drives to the basket and gets up for a one-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Karl-Anthony Towns elevates for slam dunk vs. Detroit Pistons) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Karl-Anthony Towns goes to the rim for a powerful dunk

videos.description: Jerami Grant goes up for a dunk to make it a 1-point game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (This dunk from Jerami Grant was too nice) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jerami Grant rises for a one-handed jam

videos.description: Saddiq Bey hits the triple vs. Minnesota Timberwolves

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saddiq Bey hits the triple vs. Minnesota Timberwolves) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Saddiq Bey nails the and-1 bucket from outside

videos.description: D'Angelo Russell with the smooth no-look dime to Jarred Vanderbilt for the bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (D'Angelo Russell shows off his vision with nice dime vs. Detroit Pistons) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: D'Angelo Russell is smooth as silk with this no-look dime

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns hauls in the dime from D'Angelo Russell and drains the deep 3-pointer for the Timberwolves.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (D'Angelo Russell makes a sweet dish) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: D'Angelo Russell dimes Karl-Anthony Towns for the deep 3

videos.description: Anthony Edwards uses the screen to create space and knocks down the 3-pointer to give the Timberwolves' the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anthony Edwards knocks down the 3-pointer) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anthony Edwards steps back and knocks down the 3

videos.description: Jordan McLaughlin takes it coast-to-coast and finishes with the smooth bucket to extend the Timberwolves' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nice shot from Jordan McLaughlin in from Minnesota Timberwolves vs. Detroit Pistons) 2022/02/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jordan McLaughlin takes it coast-to-coast for the bucket
